meanings.definition: The act of submitting something for consideration or approval.
meanings.sent1: The submittal of the report was met with positive feedback.
meanings.sent2: Please include the submittal with your application form.
meanings.sent3: The submittal of the cake to the judges resulted in a delicious win.
meanings.sent4: Her submittal of ideas was like a ray of sunshine in the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The submittal of the painting captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A document or item that has been submitted for review or approval.
meanings.sent1: The submittal of the proposal was well-prepared.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to attach the submittal to the email.
meanings.sent3: The submittal of the homework was a relief for the student.
meanings.sent4: His submittal of the project was a masterpiece in itself.
meanings.sent5: The submittal of the manuscript was eagerly awaited by the publisher.
